title: YASHE Cereal Storage Containers, 4Pcs Plastic Food Storage Containers with Lids Airtight, Durable Food Grade BPA-Free Cereal Containers with 16 Labels & 1 Marker
features: Keep Your Food Fresh and Safe: Say goodbye to stale cereals and messy cupboards! YASHE cereal storage containers feature airtight seals and BPA-free materials, keeping your food fresh, dry, and free from pests and moisture
Durable & Reliable Design: Crafted with premium, food-grade PP material, our cereal container are built to last. Leak-proof and odor-free, they are easy to clean and safe for the whole family

Perfect for Organizing Your Kitchen: Transform your pantry with our stackable storage containers. Their space-saving design fits neatly into cabinets, while the transparent body lets you quickly identify contents without opening the lid

Versatile & User-Friendly: Ideal for cereals, flour, rice, snacks, cornflakes, sugar, pasta, coffee, pet food and more! The wide opening ensures smooth pouring, while the included labels and chalk marker make organizing hassle-free

Value-Packed Set for Your Needs: This set includes 4pcs 3.7L containers (20.3 x 25 x 11.2cm), 16 reusable labels, a chalk marker, and four measuring spoons—everything you need to keep your kitchen tidy and efficient
